ouni Kenshin. It was the campaign through which supporters of

ishment" were by no means all "corrupt

ko, one of

ictim who died because of "guilt by

r protected by

arious places around the Kamigata (Kyoto-Osaka) area before Oraku got

Reizei was not only killed, his head was also displayed in a

e for passers-by to see.

, child, and an

unted down

ully aware of these events. Put yourselves in

ull of arsonists (Ikedaya). However, also

 conceived and intended to do "dirty"

d people for information. The
